A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I made an account just to leave this review. I can accept that this movie was not great\, but I am completely aghast that reviewers would designate it as the complete opposite.\n\nI'm not going to say don't see it\, cause it's Star Wars and you've got to watch it. But if you find yourself questioning the enthusiasm of those around you\, know that you aren't alone.
